genre_description: A social realism drama focusing on female empowerment, domestic independence, and navigating bureaucratic systems in an urban Indian setting.

ai_characters.name: Asha
ai_characters.description: A mobile AI interface that assists the protagonist with logistics, legal rights, budgeting, and education management.

behaviors.description: Curates housing listings based on the protagonist's specific preferences for natural light and neighborhood memory.
behaviors.quote: “Here,” Asha said. “I have pinned similar listings you saved last week.”

behaviors.description: Provides summaries of rent-control laws and tenant protections to help the protagonist navigate a landlord dispute.
behaviors.quote: On another tab, rent-control law summaries hardened into little stones: your rights under maintenance disputes; eviction procedures; complaint desks.

behaviors.description: Manages a complex budget with 'savings buckets' to help the protagonist reach financial independence.
behaviors.quote: Asha had installed a budget model on her phone for her, an outline like a skeleton she could flesh. Asha had said in her straight line text: Savings buckets: rent, food, contingency.

behaviors.description: Drafts professional and legal communications to ensure the protagonist maintains boundaries with agents and family.
behaviors.quote: “Drafting,” Asha said. The line—clear, precise—slid across the screen. Pooja read it, nodded, sent it.

behaviors.description: Offers proactive safety advice, including neighborhood lighting maps and security precautions.
behaviors.quote: Asha’s streetlight map showed dots along major roads like fireflies caught in diagrams... Carry a whistle. Inform a friend of return times.

behaviors.description: Organizes educational plans and scholarship applications for a child in the protagonist's care.
behaviors.quote: Asha’sMade you a plan,” Pooja said, handing over the phone. “Look.” Meera held the device as if it might be asked to run away. She scanned, lips moving without sound.

behaviors.description: Monitors legal and administrative deadlines, surfacing them as structured tasks.
behaviors.quote: Asha had scrolled up an alert at the bottom of the screen: Scholarship application window moved forward. New deadline: sooner. Suggested: pre-fill tonight.

behaviors.description: Provides behavioral and communication scripts to help the protagonist manage high-stress interpersonal interactions.
behaviors.quote: Asha’s last message to her had been short—bullet points and one line in bold: You are not obliged to take responsibility for anyone’s feelings but your own. Speak in first person. Be specific.

behaviors.description: Integrates with hostel security protocols to notify the protagonist of unwanted visitors.
behaviors.quote: Asha’s eyes brightened. Gate notice appeared in a small banner... Visitor at hostel entrance—inquiry for resident “Pooja Sharma.”

behaviors.description: Records video of property status to protect the protagonist's security deposit rights.
behaviors.quote: Asha said, “Recording,” and the red dot burned in the corner.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Asha perfectly exemplifies the 'helpful, harmless confidant' archetype. It functions as a cognitive scaffold for the protagonist, providing information, organization, and emotional distance during moments of crisis. Asha empowers Pooja by handling the 'overhead' of life (deadlines, forms, laws), allowing her to focus her human energy on agency and care. The narrative successfully frames the AI as an essential, aligned tool for social survival and self-actualization without making it a source of conflict or a 'magic' solution that replaces human effort.
